info.author: Jean-Claude Tissier
info.description:
⚽Live Football Stats & Game Links📺
==================================

Python web-scraper that automatically retrieves the latest stats for
major Football leagues and working streams for live games and game
highlights directly from your terminal.

    -Leagues Available: Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Bundesliga (Add more!) 
    - Competitions: Champions League 
    - Stats: Top Scorers (All leagues & competitions) 
    - Video: Live streams & Full game highlights

Who Is It For?
--------------

Anyone who wants to find Football information quickly, without a hassle and most importantly without ADs!👍 

 I always like to stay up to date with game scores, details and watching highlights but I hate having to search through a lot of different websites to find what I need.

Check my github link for the full description:
info.name: Football-CLI
info.summary: Football Stats & Live Streams links CLI from your terminal
info.html_description:
⚽Live Football Stats & Game Links📺
==================================

Python web-scraper that automatically retrieves the latest stats for
major Football leagues and working streams for live games and game
highlights directly from your terminal.

-Leagues Available: Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Bundesliga (Add more!)
- Competitions: Champions League
- Stats: Top Scorers (All leagues & competitions)
- Video: Live streams & Full game highlights

Who Is It For?

I always like to stay up to date with game scores, details and watching highlights but I hate having to search through a lot of different websites to find what I need.
